course.title: American Economic Policy
course.meeting_text: M., W., F., at 10, and a weekly section to be arranged.
course.faculty_text: Martin Feldstein, Jeffrey B. Liebman (Kennedy School), and Lawrence H. Summers
course.description: Analyzes major issues in American economic policy including taxation, Social Security, health care reform, budget policy, monetary and fiscal policy, and exchange rate management. Current economic issues and policy options discussed
course.prerequisites: Economics 1010a1, 1010a2, or 1011a, or permission of instructor.
course.notes: Offered jointly with the Kennedy School as API-126. This course offers an optional writing requirement which if completed will satisfy the concentration writing requirement.
